item.title: 多视图多类别散点图的利用集合覆盖优化的数据采样 (Data Sampling in Multi-view and Multi-class Scatterplots via Set Cover Optimization)
item.description: 多视图多类别散点图的利用集合覆盖优化的数据采样 对高维数据进行可视化，一个常用的方法是散点图。对于具有2个以上维度的数据，可以使用散点图矩阵(

item.title: Welcome To ZJUTVIS
item.description: 浙江工业大学数据可视化实验室 我们将在这里和大家共享对可视化与可视分析研究领域的理解，一同探讨可视化研究的进展，观察和评论最新的可视化技术和应

Bio I’m currently an associate professor at College of Computer Science and Technology, Zhejiang University of Technology, Hangzhou, China. I received B.Sc. in computer science and technology (2010), and Ph.D. degree in January, 2016 under the supervision of Ronghua Liang. During my Ph.D study, I studied and worked as a visiting intern at Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology under Prof. Huamin Qu’s supervision from February 2013 to July 2013, a research intern at Internet Graphics Group, Microsoft Research Asia with Yingcai Wu from July 2013 to January 2015, and a visiting intern at The Institute for Visualization and Interactive Systems headed by Thomas Ertl at the University of Stuttgart from July 2015 to December 2015.
